New Records: Mitchell Marsh hit an unbeaten 177* as Australia prepared for the World Cup semi-finals with a comfortable win over Bangladesh
Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh hits 177* and Steve Smith scores 63* in a partnership of 175 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins says it feels great to chase this total down and now it is on to the semis
Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto says the two run outs were crucial and they need to improve in the middle overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mitchell Marsh smites seven sixes in his innings
Australia win seven games in a row
